item.title: Lxd
item.author: habbis@medmail.ch (Eirik Habbestad Helleve)
item.description: I am now trying out LXC and LXD both are cool technologies. Lxd it is a hyper-visor for lxc containers(linux containers). So why LXD/LXC? That is a good question and it can have many answers. It have benefits like being closer to the metal. And it behaves more like a virtual machine and for me it is easier understand concept behind it. Lxd is also more like Freebsd jails and the solaris zones.
